definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: We chose steamed fish for cooking our rewards from sunset fishing.
sentences.chinese: 我们要了蒸鱼，这可是我们在日落钓鱼里的战利品。

sentences.english: Some overseer structures that are supposed to drop loot will now do so.
sentences.chinese: 一些监察官舰船已正确掉落战利品。

sentences.english: To the victor the less of the spoils the better, should nevertheless be the guideline.
sentences.chinese: 对胜利者来说，战利品越少越好应当作为指导方针。

sentences.english: The Emerald Buddha was carried off with the spoils.
sentences.chinese: 翡翠玉佛和其他战利品被洗劫一空。

sentences.english: Chinese consumers regard expensive consumer goods as trophies of success.
sentences.chinese: 中国消费者把昂贵商品看作成功的战利品。

sentences.english: Skywalker was the true prize, the gifted apprentice, the new Sith.
sentences.chinese: 天行者是真正的战利品，天才的学徒，新的西斯。

sentences.english: The war booty was shared between a rebellious prince of Toungio and the king of Arakan.
sentences.chinese: 造反的东吁亲王与阿拉干的国王分享战利品。

sentences.english: Do the spoils need to be so unevenly split?
sentences.chinese: 战利品有必要被如此不均地分割吗？

sentences.english: I looked back to see my "loot" when talking to me beat a hasty retreat.
sentences.chinese: 我回头一看，我的“战利品”趁我说话时溜之大吉了。

sentences.english: The booty bump hula hoop trick involves bending over and getting the hoop to spin vertically.
sentences.chinese: 呼啦圈的战利品凸点伎俩涉及弯腰和得到垂直旋转箍。

sentences.english: New events are available with new trophies, loot chests and challenging enemies.
sentences.chinese: 新的事件有新的战利品，拾取宝箱和敌人。

sentences.english: Troy was glad to take the horse as the spoils go to town.
sentences.chinese: 特洛伊人高兴地把木马当作战利品抬进城去。

sentences.english: I think we can both share the spoils of this land.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们可以平分征服这片土地后的战利品。

sentences.english: Mandalorian soldier claimed me as 'booty', I believe.
sentences.chinese: 我相信，一个曼德罗士兵把我作为“战利品”占有了。

sentences.english: Divers search for eggs on the sea floor dodging schools of fish, then turning in eggs for prizes.
sentences.chinese: 潜水者们潜入海底，避开鱼群搜寻蛋只作为战利品。

sentences.english: I think I was like a prize of war.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得自己像是一件战利品。

definition: to rake in (money)/to plunder/to milk people dry
precious mineral deposits/hidden treasure/(fig.) treasure/(Buddhism) the treasure of Buddha's law
